snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV MOBILE – Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
FINAL FANTASY XIV MOBILE is revealed! Licensed by SQUARE ENIX and developed by LIGHTSPEED STUDIOS, this game brings the vibrant world of Eorzea to your mobile devices.
In this reveal trailer, #FFXIV Producer & Director Naoki Yoshida shares an exciting message, accompanied by the brilliant music arranged by FFXIV Sound Director Masayoshi Soken. Warriors of Light, it's time to embark on an epic journey and discover Eorzea like never before, right on your mobile devices!
Discover more on our official site: https://www.ffxivmobile.com 

#FFXIVMOBILE #FINALFANTASYXIVMOBILE #FFXIVMOBILEFIRSTREVEAL


0:00 Intro
1:09 Trailer
3:33 Bonus scene
